action.description: The action to be taken when this IVR route is triggered.

greeting.description: The message or greeting played to the caller when this IVR route is entered.

id.description: The unique identifier for the IVR route.

ivr_id.description: The ID of the IVR associated with this route.

ivr_menu_id.description: The ID of the IVR menu associated with this route.

keypress.description: The keypress required to trigger this IVR route.

option_text.description: The text displayed for the option linked to this IVR route.

options.description: The list of options available for this IVR route.

overflow_options.description: The additional options presented when the IVR menu overflows.
